Genre : Action.about: Scientific discovery turns into self-discovery when Jim Buckner's research to unlock immortality puts his daughter in the cross-hairs of a secret war. Suffering from a side-effect of his research, telekinesis, he discovers how far he'll go to get his daughter back--as far as it takes.
Genre : Action.title: DeNovo Syndrome

Genre : Action.about: Three day’s hike into the White Cloud Mountains, six backpackers stumble across a terrifying site—a gladiator style death match between a grizzly bear and a bigfoot. Even more startling are the half-dozen bigfoot spectators. Before the panicked hikers get far, they’re intercepted by a band of militiamen who’ve been stalking the mighty bigfoot. While the militia seek to spark a violent war, the hikers scramble to survive what will become the most memorable backpacking trip of their lives.
Genre : Action.title: Hide Nor Hair

Genre : Action.about: About the Season of Random guy
Genre : Action.title: The DaVinci Code
